numbered_ace_sentences: 3. In every category, the number of players of color is higher than the number of head coaches of color.
4. I wonder why the number of players of color is higher than the number of head coaches of color.
5. It is possible that the number of players of color is higher than the number of coaches of color in the sports industry.
6. I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color in Major League Baseball is much lower than the percentage of head coaches of color in the other three leagues.
7. It is possible that the sport itself causes this difference.
8. It is possible that the association causes this difference.
9. This situation shows an increase in diversity over the years.
10. This situation likely encourages more diversity in schools.
11. This situation likely encourages more diversity in communities.
12. This situation likely encourages more diversity in workforces.
13. The headline is: Diversity in professional sports: high or low?
